catalog.name: Unite-Hub Visual Assets Catalog

images.name: Unite-Hub 3-Layer Architecture Diagram

images.about: Before/after comparison showing transformation from agency dependency to client autonomy

stepIcons.name: Step 1: Connect Gmail
stepIcons.caption: Connect your Gmail account via OAuth for automatic email monitoring

stepIcons.name: Step 2: AI Analyzes Emails
stepIcons.caption: AI automatically extracts intent and analyzes sentiment from emails

stepIcons.name: Step 3: Categorize Leads
stepIcons.caption: Contacts automatically scored and categorized based on engagement

stepIcons.name: Step 4: Generate Personalized Responses
stepIcons.caption: AI creates personalized emails using Claude Opus 4 and contact history

stepIcons.name: Step 5: Track Performance
stepIcons.caption: Monitor agent health, costs, and performance with Project Vend Phase 2 dashboard
